abstract: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry of Texas will pay more to use wealthy donors' private jets after questions about whether it underpaid.
snippet: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry of Texas will pay more to use wealthy donors' private jets after questions about whether it underpaid.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry's presidential campaign said Wednesday that it would reimburse owners of private jets an amount in the "five figures" one day after facing questions about whether it underpaid for using jets owned by wealthy donors, which could mean that the campaign may have received large, unreported in-kind contributions barred by federal election law.

headline.main: Perry to Pay Jet Owners Higher Rate After Questions About Use
